Natalie T

Natalie graduated from Edgewood High School in 1996. She attended the University of Southern Indiana where she received her Certificate of Dental Assisting in 1998. She is DANB certified, radiography licensed, CPR certified, and a member of the AADA. Natalie has also been undergoing on the job training to become an expanded functions dental assistant. She has been employed at Bloomington Pediatric Dentistry since 2003. In addition to her duties as a dental assistant, Natalie is also our Office Based Anesthesia Program Coordinator. She works closely with our dental anesthesiologist Dr. Mark Saxen and his team at Indiana Office-Based Anesthesia with scheduling. Natalie also educates the parents of patients that will be undergoing anesthesia on how to prepare their child for their appointment and what to expect after their appointment. Natalie enjoys crafting, cooking, and spending time with her family (especially her nieces and nephews). She is married to John and is “mom” to a Boston terrier named Lucy.
